fields.label: 3D model file
fields.description: Upload a glTF (.glb / .gltf) file here. The preferred format is "glTF 2.0 binary" in a single file.

fields.label: Alternative text
fields.description: Alternative text for screen readers.

fields.label: Annotations
fields.description: Add annotation labels to the 3D model by typing their their text and using the adjacent button.

fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Optional image that will be used for the background.

fields.label: Poster image
fields.description: Optional image that will be shown before the 3D model is loaded. This can be used to show a preview of the 3D model that is large and may need some time to load. Not that it makes only sense to add a poster image if the file is not too large in size itself.

fields.label: Maximum width
fields.description: H5P will usually scale content to full width. Set a maximum width here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.). Please not that this will not influence the maximum width of the H5P content as a whole.

fields.label: Maximum height
fields.description: H5P will usually determine the height based on the width. Set a maximum height here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.). Please not that this will not influence the maximum height of the H5P content as a whole.

fields.label: No model found
fields.default: Could not load a 3D model. Did someone forget to upload one?

fields.label: Front of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the front of the 3D model.

fields.label: Back of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the back of the 3D model.

fields.label: Left of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the left side of the 3D model.

fields.label: Right of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the right side of the 3D model.

fields.label: Upper front of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the upper front of the 3D model.

fields.label: Upper back of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the upper back of the 3D model.

fields.label: Upper left of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the upper left side of the 3D model.

fields.label: Upper right of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the upper right side of the 3D model.

fields.label: Lower front of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the lower front of the 3D model.

fields.label: Lower back of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the lower back of the 3D model.

fields.label: Lower left of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the lower left side of the 3D model.

fields.label: Lower right of 3D model
fields.description: Alternative text for the lower right side of the 3D model.

fields.label: Interaction prompt
fields.description: Text that is read out to the user when the 3D model is focused and the user can interact with it.
fields.default: Use mouse, touch or arrow keys to move to interact with the 3D model.

fields.label: Text for screen readers. Title for full screen button (enter)
Text for screen readers. Title for full screen button (exit)
Text for screen readers. Title for play button
Text for screen readers. Title for pause button
